alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 13 at 2:10AM PDT until April 13 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures 29 to 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures may briefly fall below freezing close to sunrise, but are expected to stay below 35 degrees for several hours. Areas shaded from early morning sun will be slower to warm up.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
